current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To condition the provision of premium and cost-sharing
		  subsidies under the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act upon a
		  certification that a program to verify household income is
		  operational.

header.#text:
Conditioning
			 provision of premium and cost-sharing subsidies under the Patient Protection
			 and Affordable Care Act upon certification that a program to verify household
			 income and other qualifications for those subsidies is
			 operational
